comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] In the DESTRUCTION OF TREE article, the writer noted the tree had been previously extensively lopped but had re-grown. He was lamenting that it had now been sawn-off at the base, but It looks like it re-grew a second time! That sure was some tree!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/pellethepoet] Amazed that the tree managed to grow back a second time after such a sever sawing-off. All hail the tree!

AB

comment.author: 64427564@N03
comment._content: I like the adverts: McNivens Ice Cream, much better than Peters; Clements tonic (snake oil?) good for coughs, colds and poxy holes; Have an X-ray ! Were they on special? Great to be reminded how simple and uncomplicated those days were. These days there would be a ton of small print.
